io.leonis.zosma.game.engine

Class Zosma

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.leonis.zosma.game.engine.Zosma
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Zosma
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The Class Zosma. This class represents a runnable game agent, ie. an object which reacts to game data and manages its own runtime.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Zosma

        public Zosma(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<I> inputPublisher,
             java.util.function.Function<org.reactivestreams.Publisher<I>,org.reactivestreams.Publisher<J>> inputAdapter,
             java.util.function.Function<org.reactivestreams.Publisher<J>,org.reactivestreams.Publisher<Q>> ai,
             java.util.function.Function<org.reactivestreams.Publisher<Q>,org.reactivestreams.Publisher<O>> outputAdapter,
             org.reactivestreams.Subscriber<O> outputSubscriber)
        Constructs a new game agent which contains adapters for dealing with external types.
        Type Parameters:
        I - The type of input accepted by the system.
        O - The type of output produced by the system.
        J - The type of input accepted by the game agent.
        Q - The type of output produced by the game agent.
        Parameters:
        inputPublisher - A Publisher of game data from an external library.
        inputAdapter - A Function which transforms the type to something the game agent can interpret.
        ai - The game agent, which transforms game data to actionable commands.
        outputAdapter - A Function which transforms actionable commands to data which can be interpreted by an external library.
        outputSubscriber - A Subscriber for sinking the data.
